img_summary: The image depicts a scene from a video game where a character is engaged in combat with an enemy named "Non-Pure." The character is wielding a weapon and appears to be in a dark, stone-floored environment. Various icons and gauges are visible on the screen, indicating health, abilities, or inventory options. The enemy, "Non-Pure," has a health bar displayed, suggesting it is a significant opponent in the game. The setting is dimly lit, adding to the atmospheric tension of the encounter.
